# frame

**Instance Property**

The layout guide’s frame in its owning view’s coordinate system.

## Declaration

```swift
var frame: NSRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The layout guide defines a rectangular space in its owning view’s coordinate system. This property contains a valid [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGRect] value by the time its owning view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/layout()] method is called.

## Related Documentation

- **layout()**: Perform layout in concert with the constraint-based layout system.

## Working With Layout Guides

- **identifier**: A string used to identify the layout guide.
- **owningView**: The view that owns this layout guide.
